amethyst.desc.region.selectionDefine: Define a region from your current selection.
amethyst.desc.region.targetBoundsDefine: Define a region by specifying coordinates.
amethyst.desc.region.addMember: Add a member to a region.
amethyst.desc.region.removeMember: Remove a member from a region.
amethyst.desc.region.setMemberRank: Set the rank of a member in a region.
amethyst.desc.region.addRole: Add a role to a region.
amethyst.desc.region.removeRole: Remove a role from a region.
amethyst.desc.region.setRoleRank: Set the rank of a role in a region.
amethyst.desc.region.addTag: Add a tag to a region.
amethyst.desc.region.removeTag: Remove a tag from a region.
amethyst.desc.region.moveLeft: Move a region to the left.
amethyst.desc.region.moveRight: Move a region to the right.
amethyst.desc.region.resizeLeft: Resize a region to the left.
amethyst.desc.region.resizeRight: Resize a region to the right.
amethyst.desc.region.moveTo: Move a region to specific coordinates.
amethyst.desc.region.centeredMoveTo: Move a region so its center is at specific coordinates.
amethyst.desc.region.z: Set the Z coordinate of a region.
amethyst.desc.region.x: Set the X coordinate of a region.
amethyst.desc.region.y: Set the Y coordinate of a region.
amethyst.desc.region.x2: Set the X2 coordinate of a region.
amethyst.desc.region.y2: Set the Y2 coordinate of a region.
amethyst.desc.region.addEnterCommand: Add a command to execute when entering a region.
amethyst.desc.region.removeEnterCommand: Remove an enter command from a region.
amethyst.desc.region.listEnterCommands: List enter commands for a region.
amethyst.desc.region.addExitCommand: Add a command to execute when exiting a region.
amethyst.desc.region.removeExitCommand: Remove an exit command from a region.
amethyst.desc.region.listExitCommands: List exit commands for a region.
amethyst.desc.region.addStayingCommand: Add a command to execute while staying in a region.
amethyst.desc.region.removeStayingComman: Remove a staying command from a region.
amethyst.desc.region.listStayingCommands: List staying commands for a region.
